Queries.ArchiveDatesQuery: SELECT TransDate FROM AnnexCloud.dbo.LoyaltyInteraction WHERE UserID = @CustomerID GROUP BY TransDate ORDER BY TransDate DESC
Queries.MaxDateQuery: SELECT MAX(TransDate) FROM AnnexCloud.dbo.LoyaltyInteraction WHERE UserID = @CustomerID
Queries.MinDateQuery: SELECT MIN(TransDate) FROM AnnexCloud.dbo.LoyaltyInteraction WHERE UserID = @CustomerID
Queries.InteractionQuery: SELECT * FROM AnnexCloud.Dbo.LoyaltyInteraction WHERE UserId = @CustomerID AND TransDate = @MaxDate
